testcase.name: Search customer by email
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customer menu............................................passed And click on customer menu Item.............................................passed And Enter customer email....................................................passed When click on search button.................................................passed Then user should found email in the search table............................passed Then close browser..........................................................passed
